Tips to remove drowsiness: Give Your Eyes a Break to Avoid Fatigue
Description: Continuous fixation on a computer screen can cause eyestrain and worsen sleepiness and fatigue. Look away from the screen for a few minutes periodically to relax your eyes.

Tips to remove drowsiness: Turn Up the Lights to Ease Fatigue
Description: Environments with dim lighting aggravate fatigue. Studies have shown that exposure to bright light can reduce sleepiness and increase alertness. Try increasing the intensity of your light source at work.

Tips to remove drowsiness: Exercise to Increase Energy and Reduce Fatigue
Description: Researchers found that exercise was more effective in increasing energy and reducing daytime fatigue than some medications used to treat sleep problems. Regular exercise also improves quality of sleep.

Tips to remove drowsiness: Don't get too comfortable while studying
